title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.10 - Progressive awards paid by over time
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 5320.10 - Progressive awards paid by over time

State Regulations
(a) Any gaming facility or group of gaming
facilities that offers a progressive award paid over time shall notify players
with an appropriate display or sign on the gaming device, except that such
display or sign need not include the cash equivalent value. In addition, the
following shall be provided to all players: (1)
the displayed jackpot will be paid over
time and not in one lump sum; and
(2)
the period of time covering the
payments. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
5320.10

Adopted

New

York State Register November 16, 2016/Volume XXXVIII, Issue 46, eff. 11/16/2016

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
